title: *SCRAP* T205 McGraw w/ Insane Yellow Borders / Blank Back ** SOLD!! **
author: shammus

posts.post_title: *SCRAP* T205 McGraw w/ Insane Yellow Borders / Blank Back ** SOLD!! **
posts.post_content:
This might be the biggest printing goof on a t205 that I've ever seen.  Definitely a scrap card that came out with bright yellow borders, blank back, color pass shifts and is very much handcut!

I know most people know what a t205 McGraw SHOULD look like, but I included a scan at the bottom just for convenience.

Asking $2100 for this monster scrap card or would consider trades for N300 Mayos or e107s!

Thanks!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
